parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
finding data by export config name.
**Example:** `Report Daily Sales`

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description:
sortOrder is to decide ascending or descending order
**Example:** `asc` or `desc`.
**Default:** `desc`

data.name: Report Daily
data.description: Template for daily report with bill item detail

parameters.name: exportConfigId
parameters.description:
Unique identifier for the export config that generated by system.
**Example**: `63c7705c8608d52094785374`

data.name: Report Daily

example.name: Report Daily
example.description: Template for daily report with bill item detail

name.description:
The name of export config. Name must be unique.
**Example**: `Report Daily`

collection.description:
The collection from which the data will be exported.
**Example**: `task`

description.description:
A brief description of the export configuration.
**Example**: `Template for daily report detail bill item`

flowIds.description:
The flow identifier used to filter the components refers only to the selected flow IDs. Use Flow /flows API to get the list of flow id.
**Example:** `['66a988d53ae08a7ab52867c2']`

fields.description:
The optional fields to be included in the exported data that ref to Flow reserved key and User fields.
**To see the details of reserved key of task, please follow this link **

id.description: An unique identifier for flow component. The value that cannot be input is the reserved key task.
